Key Match Events: Yusei Kikuchi struck out 12 batters in the game.
Kikuchi led Houston Astros to a 5-2 victory over Kansas City Royals.
Kikuchi only allowed four hits and no runners reached third base.
Post-Match Reflections: Astros manager Joe Espada praised Kikuchi's performance and the team's starting pitching.
Royals manager Matt Quatraro acknowledged Kikuchi's good stuff and tough pitching.
Kikuchi credited the Astros' coaching staff for helping him make adjustments.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros have implemented a six-man rotation to give their starting pitchers extra rest.
